edu.rit.pj2.example

Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.example.Histogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vbl, Cloneable

    public class Histogram
extends Object
implements Vbl
    Class Histogram provides a histogram used for a statistical test on a pseudorandom number generator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Histogram(Histogram hist)
      Construct a new histogram that is a deep copy of the given histogram.
      Histogram(int B)
      Construct a new histogram with the given number of bins.

    • Method Summary

      Accumulate the given random number into this histogram.

      Make this histogram be a deep copy of the given histogram.

      Returns the count in the given bin of this histogram.

      Returns the p-value of the given chi-square statistic for this histogram.

      Reduce the given shared variable into this shared variable.

        public void accumulate(double x)
        Accumulate the given random number into this histogram.

      • count

        public long count(int i)
        Returns the count in the given bin of this histogram.
        Parameters:
        i - Bin number.
        Returns:
        Count in bin i.

      • total

        public long total()
        Returns the total count in all bins of this histogram.
        Returns:
        Total count.

      • chisqr

        public double chisqr()
        Returns the chi-square statistic for this histogram. The null hypothesis is that the accumulated random numbers are uniformly distributed between 0.0 and 1.0.
        Returns:
        Chi-square statistic.

      • pvalue

        public double pvalue(double chisqr)
        Returns the p-value of the given chi-square statistic for this histogram.
        Parameters:
        chisqr - Chi-square statistic.
        Returns:
        P-value of chisqr.
